article.title: Leigher To Direct Navy Info Dominance Concepts
article.author: Henry Kenyon

tags.tag: Office of the Chief of Naval Operations

article.text: Capt. William E. Leigher, USN, has been selected for promotion to rear admiral and assignment as director of concepts, strategies and integration for information dominance, N-2/N-6F, Office of the Chief of Naval Operations, Washington, D.C.
